description: This classic classic watch face is a true eye-candy on your smartwatch.This watch face is a stylish interpretation of a classical classic watchface combined with modern functions of Android Wear.Key features:- Looks like a real clock;- Clean and simplistic design;- Adjust face brightness independent from the device brightness;- Choose between classic and smooth seconds movement;This watch face is compatible with round watches such as:- Moto 360- LG G Watch RIt can also be installed on rectangular smartwatches such as:- LG G Watch- Samsung Gear Live- Sony SmartWatch- ASUS ZenWatchFeel free to give us your feedback by mail or comments on the market to help us improve this app.
descriptionHTML:
This classic classic watch face is a true eye-candy on your smartwatch.
This watch face is a stylish interpretation of a classical classic watchface combined with modern functions of Android Wear.

Key features:
- Looks like a real clock;
- Clean and simplistic design;
- Adjust face brightness independent from the device brightness;
- Choose between classic and smooth seconds movement;

This watch face is compatible with round watches such as:
- Moto 360
- LG G Watch R

It can also be installed on rectangular smartwatches such as:
- LG G Watch
- Samsung Gear Live
- Sony SmartWatch
- ASUS ZenWatch

Feel free to give us your feedback by mail or comments on the market to help us improve this app.
comments: Very nicely rendered face but is of limited use to me. My biggest issue is ambient mode. (Ambient mode is designed to save your battery by turning off pixels, animations, and prevent screen burnout.) The ambient mode on this watch simply freezes the mostly-white screen, raising my concerns for pixel burnout. Overall excellent artwork and a beautiful watch but I will probably not use it until ambient mode issues are addressed.
Really classic watch face,but... It is really a classic watch ‚åö but it may awesome if it displays date also...üòÑ
Quality looks One of the better looking watch faces that I've downloaded
Beautiful Best classic watch I found so far
